body.name: YONISEE Office Chair - Ergonomic Desk Chair with Adjustable 2D Headrest & Lumbar Support, Til t& Height Adjustment Home Office Desk Chairs
features: We All Need A Nice "Workmate" - This ergonomic chair provides full support for your body (head-back-lumbar-elbow-hip) . If there is no way to change the status of busy work, selecting a proper ergonomic office chair can always make a difference in your health and comfort, improve your posture and help you stay comfortable throughout your work day

Ergonomic Curved Support - With a natural inward curve on the lower backrest which can maintain your back's normal curvature and helps it to stay strong and healthy. Padded headrest and lumbar support can be adjusted up and down to ensure proper support. Fully ergonomic supports will maximize comfort and ensure your body is in that ideal position, increasing productivity throughout your workday

Adjustable Armrest - Office chair with armrests takes the pressure off the shoulders and neck. 90° flip-up armrest design allows you to shorten the distance between the desk without eye strain. and get the maximum use of your workspace

Customize Your Comfort - YONISEE designs Ergonomic Chairs with Adjustable Headrest & Lumbar Support to meet different needs. Free to move the headrest, armrests, lumbar support, seat height, and tilt tension of the executive office chair. It can be applied in different scenarios according to the needs of different consumers in needs. ( Suitable for people 5'6" to 6'2" tall. Max Capacity: 300lb)

Comfy Cushion, Breathable Mesh - Properly padded seat cushion can avoid misalignments in the hips and back issues. Suitable for long sitting and relieves sedentary discomfort. The rounded cushion edge of our computer desk chair helps your knees to bend at natural ninety-degree angles. Breathable mesh material allows air to circulate allows you to sit focused and relaxed

Reliable Service - This home office desk chair passed the BIFMA Test and the SGS Test. Once you choose YONISEE, you will get easy-to-understand instruction and worry-free after-sales service. Please feel free to contact us if you encounter any problems. We are concerned and dedicated to your experience

With 5 simple steps, the home office desk chair can be assembled in less than 20 minutes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good chair for the price
reviews.reviewText: Only can adjust height. Arms can fold up. I'm 6'2 and my shoulders touch the headrest at its highest setting so not a great fit if you're tall. But for the price I don't mind it.i can still lean my head against the head rest. Can also lock it upright or allow it to rock back. Pretty basic chair with a headrest but for the price I can't complain. It arrived 2 days before the estimated arrival so that was nice too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Fairly easy to assemble. Instructions were clear. Chair is comfortable and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This computer chair is amazing.It's beautiful.First, it was very easy to assemble.It took me about a half hour (and, I am not good at these things).The directions were clear and pretty self-explanatory.The chair is incredibly comfortable.The wheels easily roll without sticking.It is very flexible.It is ergonomic.Very comfortable.The armrests and headrest are flexible.I have never felt more comfortable in a chair than I do this one.It looks nice, too.I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a good value for price
reviews.reviewText: A very nice looking chair that adds class to any office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This review is for an Office Chair - Ergonomic Desk Chair with Adjustable 2D Headrest & Lumbar & Armrest. So far I'm ok with this chair, it's not the absolute greatest, but it is better than the one it's replacing(and will hopefully last longer). It was easily put together by one person(my son) in about 15 minutes or so. I will be using a previously purchased seat cushion for more comfort. I also want to mention(especially if you are tall)that the head rest isn't as high as in the pictures, it sits right on the top of the chair and as of this writing, the photos on the product page show space between the headrest and the chair back. It just won't move to adjust. I don't know, hopefully I will get used to having my head not line up with the headrest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars breathable mesh back
reviews.reviewText: This desk chair was easy to assemble using only the hex wrench that is provided (easier if you don't get "help" from a teen who won't read instructions).I like the adjustable lumbar support and head support. It reclines a little which allows me to rock/jiggle some while sitting at my desk. It feels stable and the wheels roll smoothly. It is cold weather now, but I look forward to the breathable mesh back once it is hot again. The armrests flip up so that the chair can be pushed all the way in without them bumping into the desk top. To clarify, the height of the armrests is not adjustable. They either flip up or are horizontal.The seat is not very cushy. I may end up adding a thin cushion to the seat. The fabric is a little rough if you plan on sitting with bare legs.The pictures are a close-up of the fabric and my hand (and kitchen floor) seen through the back of the chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble, comfortable to sit in, and good looking high-back office chair.
reviews.reviewText: Upgrade your sitting situation in your office with this chair. It has a high back for excellent back support, a comfortable seat cushion, and it looks like it costs a lot. Also, it is really easy to assemble. Be a boss. Be THE boss. 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good value for money, very comfortable and nice to sit on.Quite easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was very surprised by the comfort of this chair. It is very easy to assemble, flexible, resistant, of good quality, great value for money and worth it for those who work from home and spend most of the day sitting on it.I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Very good chair and great value.
reviews.reviewText: Arriving in a relatively small box, the chair required assembly. Everything inside the box was either bagged or in another box, you also get an instruction sheet.I found the instructions, clear and straightforward - I managed to assemble this in about 20 minutes entirely by myself. All the screws fitted the holes perfectly and once assembled it looks a very good chair for the price which was about £100 when delivered.I'm 5ft 7 and this chair is just perfect for me, the seat is height adjustable as is the head rest. The chair has a tilt mechanism and the arms flip up, you can tighten the resistance of the arms but you have to do it whilst assembling the chair - this is a bad design in my opinion. However I dislike these types of arms and would have preferred proper adjustable arms.The fabric on the arms and seat is nice to the touch and the back of the chair is mesh so you'll stay cool in the summer. The seat is quite thick, certainly compared to the cheaper chair I had bought previously - now I realise how bad that was! However it is a little firm, but may well be more forgiving over time - personally I find it just right.I also found the wheels glided nicely on a medium pile carpet and didn't get bogged down.The only issue I had was some white residue on the black parts of the chair, these wiped away easily however there was also a small mark on the back mesh which has not gone however you can't see it whilst sat in the chair so just 1 star docked as the QA could be better given everything was bagged up in the box.Overall this is a very good chair for the price and it really does look very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Real pain to assemble but once it's done it's pretty goodThe instructions should say that you should attach the wheels to the five-spoke frame at the bottom first, then put the upright into it, and then install the bracket under the seat, and then do the rest of it about the arms and the back, because it doing it the other way around just means you've got more mess and it doesn't even take very long to assemble the other bits first, and some of their instructions make less logical sense than other companies however at least they do provide everything that you need. The overall feel is very good, and of course it's very rare to find a chair that can fold itself under the desk, which is perfect for those of you with smaller rooms or limited space around the desk.The arms are flip up and down and they're very comfortable adjusted for probably the average build, however if you want something with more adjustability then this is not itThe seat is very comfortable and the height adjustment is pleasant as wellNewton also pull the arm out and adjust the rocking motion from on to off but you can't lock it in place except uprightGreat chair and highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice office chair.The item arrives in small box which i actually didn't expect and that's a positive for me.When it comes to the assembly part i have to say that was hard because the instructions are not really easy to understand. I couldn't do it myself and actually had to ask my boyfriend to do it and took him around 30/35 min for fully assembly.After all that when it comes quality it seems ok but its all fabric including the armrests.It's not a top quality chair but its comfortable and works well, so far i have nothing bad to say about it.Love the fact i can make it look better by removing the headrest which i'm not particularly a fan of.Overall i recommend this item.
